meanings.definition: A rectangular groove cut into a board or plank.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter carefully measured the dado before cutting it into the wooden board.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelf had a beautiful dado along its side, adding a decorative touch.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the dado was a perfect hiding spot for its toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a dado, leaving a lasting impression on everyone who heard them.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight cast a shadow over the dado, creating a striking contrast with the wood.

meanings.definition: The lower part of an interior wall when it is finished differently from the upper part.
meanings.sent1: The painter chose a bold color to paint the dado, making it stand out from the rest of the wall.
meanings.sent2: The dado in the living room was elegantly designed, complementing the overall decor.
meanings.sent3: The dado seemed to have a secret life of its own, whispering stories to those who listened closely.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright dado, bringing warmth to the otherwise plain wall.
meanings.sent5: The dado was like a boundary between two worlds, separating the calm below from the chaos above.
